name: Bluefly, Inc.
description: Bluefly, Inc. is a leading online retailer specializing in high-end fashion and lifestyle products. Founded in 1998, Bluefly has transformed the way consumers shop for designer brands by offering an extensive selection of apparel, accessories, and home goods at discounted prices. The company’s mission is to make luxury shopping accessible to everyone, leveraging technology to enhance the shopping experience. Bluefly partners with a variety of luxury brands to provide customers with genuine products at competitive prices, ensuring that shoppers can find the latest trends and timeless classics all in one place. With a focus on customer satisfaction, Bluefly combines an engaging online platform with efficient logistics and customer service support. The company also emphasizes its commitment to sustainability by promoting eco-friendly practices within its operations and encouraging responsible consumerism. As the fashion industry evolves, Bluefly continues to innovate, offering exclusive collections and personalized shopping experiences that cater to the diverse needs of its clientele. As a pioneer in the online fashion marketplace, Bluefly remains dedicated to providing high-quality products while adapting to the ever-changing landscape of retail.

seo.meta_title: Bluefly, Inc. | Luxury Fashion at Affordable Prices
seo.meta_description: Shop Bluefly, Inc. for designer apparel, accessories, and home goods at discounted prices. Discover exclusive collections and the latest trends.

faq.question: What does Bluefly specialize in?
faq.answer: Bluefly specializes in high-end fashion and lifestyle products, offering designer apparel, accessories, and home goods.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Bluefly?
faq.answer: Samantha Becker is the CEO of Bluefly, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Bluefly headquartered?
faq.answer: Bluefly is headquartered in New York, New York, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does Bluefly sell?
faq.answer: Bluefly sells apparel, accessories, and home goods, featuring a wide range of designer brands.
